  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/113018</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/113018</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Čutila in živčevje</string>
            <string language="en">Sensory and Nervous systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sensorische und nervöse Systeme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes sensoriels et nerveux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas sensory e nervosos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi sensoriali e nervosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αισθητήρια και νευρικά συστήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistemas sensoriales y nerviosos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo didaktičnega pripomočka učenci utrdijo svoje znanje o čutilih in njihovem delovanju. Igro lahko oblikujemo kot spomin, učenci iščejo pare ali pa kot kartice, ki imajo na eni strani pojem, ki ga želimo utrditi in na drugi strani razlago. Igra bo trajnejša, če kartončke plastificiramo.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of paired cards (image - description) regarding sensory and nervous systems that can be used for a game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">čutila</string>
            <string language="en">sensory systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">živčevje</string>
            <string language="en">nervous systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">možgani</string>
            <string language="en">brains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">živec</string>
            <string language="en">nerve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set zusammengepaßte Karten (Bild - Beschreibung)
betreffend die sensorischen und nervösen Systeme, die für ein Spiel 
benutzt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de cartes appareillées (image - 
description) concernant les systèmes sensoriels et nerveux qui 
peuvent être utilisés pour un jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos cartões emparelhados (imagem - 
descrição) a respeito dos sistemas sensory e nervosos que podem ser 
usados para um jogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle schedi accoppiate (immagine - 
descrizione) per quanto riguarda i sistemi sensoriali e nervosi che 
possono essere usati per un gioco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο ταξινομημένων κατά ζεύγος καρτών (εικόνα - 
περιγραφή) σχετικά με τα αισθητήρια και νευρικά συστήματα που 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για ένα παιχνίδι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de las tarjetas emparejadas (imagen - 
descripción) con respecto a los sistemas sensoriales y nerviosos que 
se pueden utilizar para un juego.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sensorische Systeme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nervöse Systeme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nerv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systèmes sensoriels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systèmes nerveux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nerf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistemas sensory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nervo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αισθητήρια συστήματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
